title: Most attestations missed, various errors.
body:
#6226 ðŸ’Ž Issue

Running through prysm.sh on Ubuntu 20.04 I7 8750H 512GSSD, generic broadband connection.

Getting lots of missed attestations:

https://beaconscan.com/validator/0xaccde6dc96d4cebf609d7abe5d61d21bdd827b2141dfc60594442971400f844856b9588a0582147d40d40a1cc92cea63#
